text: Farewell to St. Petersburg () is a 1972 Soviet drama movie directed by Yan Frid.Дорога в "Рай" и третья территорияПРОЩАНИЕ С ПЕТЕРБУРГОМ It stars Girt Yakovlev, Tatyana Bedova, and Tatyana Piletskaya. ==Actors== *Girt Yakovlev - Johann Strauss (voiced by Aleksandr Demyanenko) *Tatyana Bedova - Olga Smirnitskaya, Russian aristocrat *Tatyana Piletskaya - Natalia G. Smirnitskaya *Vasili Merkuryev - Leybrok *Pavel Kadochnikov - Pavel Maksimov *Igor Dmitriev - Grand Duke *Sergey Karnovich-Valois - manager == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1972 movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies about nobility Category:Movies set in Saint Petersburg
title: Farewell to St. Petersburg (movie)
